transcript.text: Hello everyone
Today we are going to prepare an express pasta gratin with meat and vegetables
Slice a large onion in small cubes
Cut a green pepper in dice
Put olive oil to heat on low heat
Put the vegetables in
Sweat the onions for 5 minutes, stirring regularly
Cut 350 g of veal into small cubes
You can replace the meat with minced beef balls
Add the meat once the onions are translucent
For more recipe ideas,
I invite you to subscribe to my channel
without forgetting to activate the bell of notifications so as not to miss any video.
Stir
Add salt, pepper, garlic powder
and a teaspoon of tomato puree
Mix
Cover and cook for 15 minutes over medium heat
Slice a zucchini into pieces
Slice 100 g of mushrooms
You can also add broccoli or carrots
are vegetables that go well with this recipe
Add 250 g of pasta of your choice
Add the vegetables
Add 180 ml of tomato coulis
Possibility of replacing with 1 or 2 fresh tomatoes
Mix
Cover with 1 L of water boiling
Stir then cover
Cook for 10 to 15 minutes, making sure that the water does not evaporate completely
otherwise everything will stick to the bottom of the pan
Add a little finely chopped fresh cilantro
Mix
Remove the pan from the heat
You can enjoy the dish as what
or be patient if you are more greedy
Arrange the pasta in a square gratin dish of 20 centimeters
Preheat the oven in advance to 190 ° C
Sprinkle the surface with 150 g of grated cheese
Put in the oven 35 to 40 minutes
Remove from the oven when it is nicely browned on the surface
Let cool a few minutes before tasting
I hope you liked the recipe See you
soon
